thread.title: Russia's Norilsk Nickel says to take 20 bln rouble loan from VTB
thread.title_full: Russia's Norilsk Nickel says to take 20 bln rouble loan from VTB | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Russia's Norilsk Nickel says to take 20 bln rouble loan from VTB
text:
MOSCOW, Sept 11 Russia's Norilsk Nickel said on Friday its board had approved taking an up to 20 billion rouble ($294.4 million) loan from VTB Bank.
The loan, which is to be repaid in five years, will be partly used to finance the construction of a power supply line for Norilsk's Bystrinskoye mining project in the Chita region in east Siberia, a company spokesman said. ($1 = 67.9400 roubles) (Reporting by Andrey Kuzmin; Writing by Maria Kiselyova; Editing by Alexander Winning)
